text: Dead Children Playing is a picture book by Stanley Donwood and Thom Yorke. It has art from albums by Yorke and the band Radiohead. == Versions == The first version of Dead Children Playing came out in 2006, to go with an art exhibition in Barcelona, Spain. Donwood got the name from a sign he saw in a park. The second version came out on 1 October 2007 by Verso Publishing. == References == == Links outside == * Dead Children Playing Website * Dead Children Playing on Amazon Category:Radiohead Category:2006 books
title: Dead Children Playing
